RelatedSentence: The owner of a party - supplies store in East Austin was arrested last week after buying several stolen bicycles , according to an arrest affidavit .
Sergio Lejarazu , 48 , owner of Jumpolin Rentals at 1401 E. Cesar Chavez St. , was arrested Wednesday after police say he bought two bicycles from an informant , the document said .

Sergio Lejarazu , 48 , owner of Jumpolin Rentals at 1401 E. Cesar Chavez St. , was arrested Wednesday after police say he bought two bicycles from an informant , the document said .
The informant implied each time that the bikes were stolen , it said .
Police then trailed Lejarazu to a Southeast Austin storage unit , where he was seen exchanging the bikes for cash with two men in a van .
Police then trailed Lejarazu to a Southeast Austin storage unit , where he was seen exchanging the bikes for cash with two men in a van .
He was arrested after leaving the unit , police said .
He was arrested after leaving the unit , police said .
Lejarazu was charged with a theft by appropriation and is being held at the Travis County Jail on $ 7,000 bail .
